var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
Headers.Authorization = ('Bearer ' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token"))) || '';
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) || cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) == '') {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        //exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/filter/classify';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url)).data.classifyList[0].list;
R = `{{Get('r')+1}}`;
Cate = `{{get('cate',Get('o'))}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('p'))}}`;
Zone = `{{get('zone',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/filter/list?theme=${kind[i].tagId}&cate=${Cate}&status=${Status}&zone=${Zone}&sortType=${R}&page={{page}}&size=20`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tagName, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

    return style;
}

if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cache.get(Get('url') + "authorization") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "authorization")).length !== 0 && ImageLimit() !== 'undefined') {
        let L = Login_1();

}

header:
<js>

headers={

    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': '',
            'cover': list[i].imageUrl,
            'url': Get('url') + '/api/query,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json"},"method": "POST"}'
        });
    }
    Data();
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var body = '{"operationName":"searchComicAndAuthorQuery","variables":{"keyword":"' + e + '"},"query":"query searchComicAndAuthorQuery($keyword: String!) {
  searchComicsAndAuthors(keyword: $keyword) {
    comics {
      id
      title
      status
      year
      imageUrl
      authors {
        id
        name
        __typename
      }
      categories {
        id
        name
        __typename
      }
      dateUpdated
      monthViews
      views
      favoriteCount
      lastBookUpdate
      lastChapterUpdate
      __typename
    }
    authors {
      id
      name
      chName
      enName
      wikiLink
      comicCount
      views
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}"}';
    return Get('url') + '/api/query,{"body":' + body + ',"headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json"},"method":"POST"}';
}(key));
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ps：
删注释者减寿秃头倒大霉

使用指南：
若当前无法使用该源，原因有二
一、ip不对需切换网络
二、网站改新网址了

第一种情况 只需切换WIFI/流量/梯子即可
第二种情况 需按以下步骤操作
①复制永久站网址
②用浏览器打开该网址
③随机打开可用入口
④复制当前入口的网址
⑤将此源URL替换成复制的网址

注：
若两种情况都无法解决失效问题 
大概率网站改代码了 
随缘等人修复 主要看命
感谢关耳大大写的正文规则

2022.10.1 酷安@乃星

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
title = [
    '排行',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
orderby = [
    '/rank/',
    '/update/{{page}}/'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.4, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url') + '/search/';
var list = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Url)).select('.filter-item.clearfix')[2].select('li');
OO = `{{get('oo',Get('o'))}}`;
PP = `{{get('pp',Get('p'))}}`;
QQ = `{{get('qq',Get('q'))}}`;
RR = `{{get('rr',Get('r'))}}`;
SS = `{{get('ss',Get('s'))}}`;
for (i in list) {
    var kind = i;
    var kind1 = String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/\/list\//, '-').replace(/\/$/, '').replace(/^\-$/, '');
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/list/${OO}${PP}${kind1}${SS}${QQ}${RR}{{page}}/`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(list[i].text(), url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
Uid = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid"));
Uid1 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid1"));
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('my=')) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Uid"), Uid);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("dmzj-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv3api')}}/UCenter/subscribeWithLevel?uid=${Uid}&sub_type=0&page={{page-1}}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nninterface')}}/api/getReInfoWithLevel/comic/${Uid}/{{page-1}}?uid=${Uid}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
U1 = `{{Get('u') < 3 ? Get('u') : '2'}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/0-${T}-${U}-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/1-0-${U1}-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/2-0-3-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv3api') + '/classify/filter.json?uid=${Uid1}';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url))[0].items;
R = `{{Get('r')}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    Filter = `{{String(get('theme','`;
    Filter1 = `') + '-' + get('cate',Get('o')) + '-' + get('status',Get('p')) + '-' + get('zone',Get('q'))).replace(/0-|\-0/g, '')}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv3api')}}/classifyWithLevel/${Filter}${i}${Filter1}/${R}/{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tag_name, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

ruleContent.content: header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-aym.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic." var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic + chapter_domain +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '人气',
    '更新',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','机战','运动','推理','冒险','搞笑','战争',
    '神魔','忍者','竞技','悬疑','社会','恋爱','宠物','吸血',
    '萝莉','后宫','御姐','霸总','玄幻','古风','历史','漫改',
    '游戏','穿越','恐怖','真人','科幻','都市','武侠','修真',
    '生活','动作'
];
link = [
    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];
OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

'〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': list.comic_name, 'author': list.comic_author, 'kind': s + ',' + k, 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ') + changeLog, 'cover': list.cover_list[0], 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { (function Book() { apiBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_api_${Get('url')}`); json = java.ajax(apiBaseUrl); Title = JSON.parse(json)['title']; Intro = JSON.parse(json)['intro']; return { Title: Title, Intro: Intro }; }()); book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'], 'latest': Title[Title.length - 1], 'intro': Intro[0] }); } Put(book);

if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken"))).length == 0) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-collect/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18`, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
}
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=2`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('排行', url1, 1, 0.2, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=4`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('新作', url2, 1, 0.2, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=5`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('完结', url3, 1, 0.2, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/system/dict-data/list?dictType=vv_mh_category')).data;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&cateid=${kind[i].value}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].label, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

var Link = '';

var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var category = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/system/dict-data/list?dictType=vv_mh_category')).data;
    if (/mh-collect/.test(baseUrl)) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.list;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].episodes,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].coverPic,
                'url': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/get?id=' + list[i].mhid
            });
        }
    } else {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.list;
        for (i in list) {
            var kinds = [];
            var kindElements = list[i].cateids ? list[i].cateids.split(',') : [];
            for (var j in kindElements) {
                kinds.push(String(category[kindElements[j]-1].label));
            }
            kind1 = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
            var kind = '✦ ' + Num(list[i].readnum) + ',' + '♥ ' + Num(list[i].reader) + ',' + kind1;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].author.replace(/[&|,_×]/g, '/').replace(/\sx\s/g, '/').replace(/(\W)\s+(\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/\/+/g, '/'),
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].episodes + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].updateTime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕',
                'intro': list[i].summary,
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].coverPic,
                'url': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/get?id=' + list[i].id
            });
        }
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pageNo=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pageNo=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.list[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

exploreUrl:
连载::https://www.xianman123.com/f-1-0-0-1-0-0-{{page}}.html
完结::https://www.xianman123.com/f-1-0-0-2-0-0-{{page}}.html
国漫::https://www.xianman123.com/f-1-0-1-0-0-0-{{page}}.html
日漫::https://www.xianman123.com/f-1-0-2-0-0-0-{{page}}.html
更新::https://www.xianman123.com/f-1-0-0-0-0-0-{{page}}.html
排行::https://www.xianman123.com/f-1-0-0-0-0-1-{{page}}.html

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  分　　类  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '全部漫画',
    '最新上架'
];
orderby = [
    '/classify',
    '/list/new'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}?page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.45, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','恋爱','纯爱','古风','异能','悬疑','剧情','科幻',
    '奇幻','玄幻','穿越','冒险','推理','武侠','格斗','战争',
    '热血','搞笑','大女主','都市','总裁','后宫','日常','韩漫',
    '少年','其他'
];
type = [
    'type=all','type=lianai','type=chunai','type=gufeng','type=yineng','type=xuanyi','type=juqing','type=kehuan',
    'type=qihuan','type=xuanhuan','type=chuanyue','type=mouxian','type=tuili','type=wuxia','type=gedou','type=zhanzheng',
    'type=rexie','type=gaoxiao','type=danuzhu','type=dushi','type=zongcai','type=hougong','type=richang','type=hanman',
    'type=shaonian','type=qita'
];
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
Filter = `{{get('filter',Get('p'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/classify?${type[j]}${Region}${State}${Filter}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
var Result = java.ajax(baseUrl + '/services/user.php?op=whoami');
let ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl);
if (!ck.includes('user=deleted') && ck.includes('user=')) {
    var list = JSON.parse(Result).value;
    var user = list.screenname;
    var fav = String(list.itemname);
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Fav_1", fav.replace(/@/, 'fav-'));
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Fav_2", fav.replace(/@/, '%40'));
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1", user);
} else {
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1",'');
}
Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : '';
Url1 = `{{get('url1','0')}}`;
Url2 = `{{get('url2','0')}}`;
Url3 = `{{get('url3','0')}}`;
Url4 = `{{get('url4','0')}}`;
Url5 = `{{get('url5','0')}}`;
Cs = `{{get('cs','0')}}`;
Sort = `{{java.encodeURI(get('sort',Get('p')))}}`;
Sort_1 = `{{get('sort_1',Get('p'))}}`;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    java.ajax(Get('url') + '/account/login');
    ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl);
    if (!ck.includes('user=deleted') && ck.includes('user=') && Account) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
        Result = java.ajax(baseUrl + '/services/user.php?op=whoami');
        list = JSON.parse(Result).value;
        user = list.screenname;
        cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1", user);
    }
    if(String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) {
        Fav1 = cache.get(Get('url') + "Fav_1");
        Fav2 = cache.get(Get('url') + "Fav_2");
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${Fav1}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav1}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的合集', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}account_details&page_target=${Fav2}&page_elements=${Cs}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('MH')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav2}%2Fcollections?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
}
    MY = Get('my');
    for (i in MY) {
        let title = MY[i].split("::")[0];
        let link = MY[i].split("::")[1];
        let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
        exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
    }
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨书籍✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部文本', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}texts${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}texts?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部书籍', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}books${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}books?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
TEXT = Get('text');
for (i in TEXT) {
    let title = TEXT[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = TEXT[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨视频✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部视频', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}movies${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('v')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}movies?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
VIDEO = Get('video');
for (i in VIDEO) {

}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨音频✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部音频', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}audio${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}audio?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部音乐', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}etree${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('a')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}etree?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
AUDIO = Get('audio');

}

    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部图像', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}image${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('i')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}image?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));

var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
data = JSON.parse(result).data;
JSON.stringify({
	  "name": String(decode(data.Name)),
	  "author": String(decode(data.Author)),
	  "img": String(data.Img),
	  "desc": String(decode(data.Desc)),
	  "time": String(data.LastTime),
	  "new": String(data.LastChapter),
	  "kind": String(data.CName)+","+String(data.BookStatus),
	})
</js>

ruleExplore.author: $.Author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
var list = [];
JSON.parse(result).data.BookList.forEach(str=>{
	list.push({
		"Name":decode(str.Name),
		"Author":decode(str.Author),
		"Img":str.Img,
		"CName":decode(str.CName)+","+str.Score+"分",
		"Desc":decode(str.Desc),
		"Id":str.Id
		})
	})
JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$.*

    return style;
}

];

    '6',
    '7'
];

for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${Gengxin}/${orderby[i]}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (rank.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (rank.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';

kind = [

    '奇幻','轻小说','生活','悬疑','格斗','搞笑','伪娘','竞技',

];
Shudan = `{{get('shudan',Get('ci0'))}}`;
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${Shudan}/${Region}/${kind[j]}/${State}/{{page}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID1 = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID1; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}

var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
link = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
Area = `{{get('area',Get('o'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=${link[j]}&area=${Area}&end=${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/api/rank/0-0-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/latest/{{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, 0.4, false));
}
title1 = [
    '韩国','完结','连载','更新',
    '日本','完结','连载','更新'
];
url1 = [
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-2-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-1-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-2-1-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-2-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-1-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-3-1-{{page}}`'
];
for (i in title1) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title1[i], eval(url1[i]), 1, 0.2, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
type = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版漫画',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','日常','其它','纯爱','推理',
    '奇幻','格斗','大女主','剧情','总裁','武侠','异能','少年',
    '韩漫'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/54','/tags/55','/tags/56','/tags/57','/tags/58','/tags/59','/tags/60',
    '/tags/61'
];
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/category/list/${O}/finish/${Q}/order/${Order}${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(50, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','爱情','武侠','格斗','侦探',
    '推理','剧情','其它','总裁','奇幻','韩漫','纯爱','日常',
    '少年','大女主','异能'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/294','/tags/295','/tags/296','/tags/297','/tags/298','/tags/299','/tags/300',
    '/tags/301','/tags/302','/tags/303'
];
order = [
    'hits',
    'addtime'
];
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/category/list/${O}/finish/${Q}/order/${Order}${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
    if(String(Account).length > 0 && baseUrl.includes('/login')) {
        Login();
        let url = String(Get('url') + '/user/' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) + '/favorite/albums');
        java.setContent(java.get(url,Headers).body());
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/user/')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-6.col-sm-3.col-md-3.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.video-title.title-truncate');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/watchlist')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-3.col-sm-2.col-md-2.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.image-item-text');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    var list = java.getElements('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = $('.m-t-5.title-truncate.video-title');
        var authors = [];
        var titleTruncateElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in titleTruncateElements) {
            if (!titleTruncateElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                authors.push(String(titleTruncateElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/(&| & | \|,|\s)/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/');
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            if (kindElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        kind = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        kind = '♥ ' + list[i].select('.text-white').text() +',' + $('.category-icon').replace(/[ ]/g, ',') + ','+ kind.replace(java.s2t($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(java.t2s($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,|中$/g, ',');
        kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1');
        img = list[i].select('.img-responsive.lazy_img');
        cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + String(list[i].select('a')[0].attr('href')).replace(/(\/.*?\/\d+\/).*/, '$1') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15')).includes(String(list[0]))) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

    return style;
}

    '上升',

    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '最近更新',
    '新书发布',
    '推荐漫画'
];
orderby = [
    '/ranking/all',
    '/ranking/monthly',
    '/ranking/weekly',
    '/ranking/daily',
    '/update',
    '/update/newbook',
    '/update/recommend'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版','肉欲','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之妇','女大生','狗血剧','同居','好友','调教','动作','后宫',
    '不伦','3D','校园','耽美','日漫'
];
link = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版漫画','肉慾','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之婦','女大生','狗血劇','同居','好友','調教','动作','後宮',
    '不倫','3D','校園','耽美','日漫'
];
Ob = `{{get('ob',Get('p'))}}`;
St = `{{get('st',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics/${link[j]}/ob/${Ob}/st/${St}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行榜',
    '连载中',
    '已完结'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/top.html`',
    '`${host}/weekly/?page={{page}}`',
    '`${host}/complete/?page={{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, -1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '韩国',
    '连载',
    '完结',
    '日本',
    '连载',
    '完结'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画'
];
end = [
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1',
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1'
];
for (i in title) {
    url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}&area=1&end=${end[i]}`;
    url2 = '&page={{page}}';
    url = url1 +url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:

var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=全部&area=-1&end=`;
url2 = '&page={{page}}';
title = [
    '全部',
    '完结'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = url1 + i + url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, -1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleBookInfo.author: class.detail-main-info-author.1@a@text
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
// origin 
origin = baseUrl.match(/(https.{3,4}[^\/]+)\//)[1]
source.setVariable(origin)


src
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: class.detail-main-info-title@text

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//本地解密标志位
DEBUG = 0

{{source.bookSourceComment}}

// origin 
origin = source.getVariable()

// aes keys auto update
chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/)
if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) {
  cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1]))
}

// img_array
imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src)
.select(".content-img").toArray()
.map(v=>v.attr("data-r-src"))

if (DEBUG) imgs.splice(1)

imgs.toImg(null,
{headers:{origin:origin}}
	)

</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> 
//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

<js>

page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';

var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行榜',
    '连载中',
    '已完结'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/top.html`',
    '`${host}/weekly/?page={{page}}`',
    '`${host}/complete/?page={{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, -1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
    if(String(Account).length > 0 && baseUrl.includes('/login')) {
        Login();
        let url = String(Get('url') + '/user/' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) + '/favorite/albums');
        java.setContent(java.get(url,Headers).body());
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/user/')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-6.col-sm-3.col-md-3.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.video-title.title-truncate');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/watchlist')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-3.col-sm-2.col-md-2.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.image-item-text');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    var list = java.getElements('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = $('.m-t-5.title-truncate.video-title');
        var authors = [];
        var titleTruncateElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in titleTruncateElements) {
            if (!titleTruncateElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                authors.push(String(titleTruncateElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/(&| & | \|,|\s)/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/');
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            if (kindElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        kind = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        kind = '♥ ' + list[i].select('.text-white').text() +',' + $('.category-icon').replace(/[ ]/g, ',') + ','+ kind.replace(java.s2t($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(java.t2s($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,|中$/g, ',');
        kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1');
        img = list[i].select('.img-responsive.lazy_img');
        cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + String(list[i].select('a')[0].attr('href')).replace(/(\/.*?\/\d+\/).*/, '$1') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15')).includes(String(list[0]))) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

    return style;
}

    '上升',

    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken"))).length == 0) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-collect/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18`, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
}
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=2`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('排行', url1, 1, 0.2, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=4`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('新作', url2, 1, 0.2, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=5`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('完结', url3, 1, 0.2, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/system/dict-data/list?dictType=vv_mh_category')).data;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&cateid=${kind[i].value}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].label, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);

    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '最近更新',
    '新书发布',
    '推荐漫画'
];
orderby = [
    '/ranking/all',
    '/ranking/monthly',
    '/ranking/weekly',
    '/ranking/daily',
    '/update',
    '/update/newbook',
    '/update/recommend'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版','肉欲','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之妇','女大生','狗血剧','同居','好友','调教','动作','后宫',
    '不伦','3D','校园','耽美','日漫'
];
link = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版漫画','肉慾','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之婦','女大生','狗血劇','同居','好友','調教','动作','後宮',
    '不倫','3D','校園','耽美','日漫'
];
Ob = `{{get('ob',Get('p'))}}`;
St = `{{get('st',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics/${link[j]}/ob/${Ob}/st/${St}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

headers={

}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '韩国',
    '连载',
    '完结',
    '日本',
    '连载',
    '完结'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画'
];
end = [
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1',
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1'
];
for (i in title) {
    url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}&area=1&end=${end[i]}`;
    url2 = '&page={{page}}';
    url = url1 +url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=全部&area=-1&end=`;
url2 = '&page={{page}}';
title = [
    '全部',
    '完结'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = url1 + i + url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, -1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
type = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版漫画',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

ruleContent.content:
<js>
jm=java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name="client"]@content'));
if(jm.length()>1){
var conts = [],list=[];
code=result.match(/codeurl="(\d+)";/)[1];
data=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
datas=data.select("p[style*='text-indent']");
jm=String(jm).split(/[A-Z]+%/);
for(i=0;i<jm.length;i++){
	k=Math.ceil((i + 1) % parseInt(code));
	j=Math.ceil(jm[i] - k);
	conts[j]=datas[i];
	}
	for(i in conts){
		c=String(conts[i]).replace(/.*本章尚未读完,请.*一页继续阅读.*/g,'');
		list.push(c);
		list.join("\n");
		}
	}else{java.getString(".novelcontent@html")}
</js>
